argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | evpmodpmf1o.s | |- S = ( SymGrp ` D ) |
| 2 |  | evpmodpmf1o.p | |- P = ( Base ` S ) |
| 3 |  | pmtrodpm.t | |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` D ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( D e. Fin /\ F e. T ) -> D e. Fin ) |
| 5 | 3, 1, 2 | #P_symgtrf | |- T C_ P |
| 6 | 5 | #P_sseli | |- ( F e. T -> F e. P ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( D e. Fin /\ F e. T ) -> F e. P ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( pmSgn ` D ) = ( pmSgn ` D ) |
| 9 | 1, 3, 8 | #P_psgnpmtr | |- ( F e. T -> ( ( pmSgn ` D ) ` F ) = -u 1 ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( D e. Fin /\ F e. T ) -> ( ( pmSgn ` D ) ` F ) = -u 1 ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 8 | #P_psgnodpmr | |- ( ( D e. Fin /\ F e. P /\ ( ( pmSgn ` D ) ` F ) = -u 1 ) -> F e. ( P \ ( pmEven ` D ) ) ) |
| 12 | 4, 7, 10, 11 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( D e. Fin /\ F e. T ) -> F e. ( P \ ( pmEven ` D ) ) ) |
